title: Tour de France Stage 19: Unstoppable Poga훾ar Powers Past Jorgenson to Put Stamp on Yellow Jersey
content:
Poga훾ar erases any doubt about who will win this Tour de France as he blows up Visma's ambush plan by dropping Vingegaard on Isola 2000 and spoils Jorgenson's shot at victory.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 19: Unstoppable Poga훾ar Powers Past Jorgenson to Put Stamp on Yellow Jersey on Velo.
author: ahood
